sunlight: Full sun only if soil kept moist
description: Hardy begonia (Begonia grandis subsp. evansiana 'Alba') is an amazing plant species. This plant is hardy, meaning it is able to withstand cold temperatures, making it even more resilient. Its beautiful white and pink flowers bloom in the late summer months, and it can also be used as a ground cover. Hardy begonias are also low-maintenance and can be used to add a touch of color and texture to any garden. Additionally, it is also shade-tolerant, making it a great choice for shady areas. Hardy begonias are a wonderful choice for gardeners looking for something that is easy to maintain and adds charm and beauty to the landscape.
